thread.title: Global IT Solutions Provider Selects Crafter CMS to Power Next Generation Government Website
thread.title_full: Global IT Solutions Provider Selects Crafter CMS to Power Next Generation Government Website

author: Amanda Tevis
title: Global IT Solutions Provider Selects Crafter CMS to Power Next Generation Government Website
text:
Crafter Software, the award-winning provider of innovative Web content management software that powers high performance, personalized digital experiences, announced today a new customer in the IT solutions industry headquartered in India, with over 100+ offices worldwide. The global IT solutions provider is widely known for implementing breakthrough solutions and was looking for another in the form of an innovative Web content management solution to enable their government client to create modern personalized experiences for an audience measured in the hundreds of millions. After careful research they chose Crafter CMS for its ability to create innovative personalized experiences, deliver high performance content to a very large audience, enable Web developers with modern technology, and provide editors with powerful yet easy to use content authoring tools.
“Systems integrators and solution providers around the world are finding Crafter's modern architecture a perfect fit for their largest customers and biggest challenges.” said Russ Danner, VP of Products at Crafter Software. “Crafter CMS outpaces even the biggest players in the Web experience management space with our unique blend of modern technology, the industry’s most scalable and high performance content delivery platform, and super friendly tools for both developers and content authors. In addition, we make Crafter CMS available in three flavors - as a free and open source download, as a commercially supported on-premise solution, and as the industry's only pure SaaS CMS solution in the cloud. Crafter CMS makes today’s complex digital marketing, customer experience, and e-commerce problems simple. Today’s largest solution providers need to deliver top tier solutions to their customers quickly and affordably - Crafter CMS makes it possible.”
About Crafter Software
Crafter Software enables the creation of rich and engaging websites, mobile applications, and multi-channel digital experiences. Available both in the cloud and on-premise, Crafter Software’s solutions are based on the award-winning Crafter CMS open source project, which was built from the ground up as a modern platform for creating more relevant Web and mobile experiences through targeted delivery of personalized content. Serving as the lynchpin between enterprise systems and end users, Crafter’s solutions enable marketing, sales and support teams to author and manage content while harvesting analytics and data-driven insights to deliver engaging experiences across all digital channels - the Web, mobile, social, and more. Learn more at http://craftersoftware.com , http://craftercms.org and http://craftercloud.io .
